original_title: 竹下パフォーマンス　秘芸!　水戸黄門
overview: A student film made by Shinya Takeshita at the Osaka University of Arts. This short references the popular jidaigeki series Mito Kōmon, a drama that ran for 42 years on the Tokyo Broadcasting System. Takeshita portrays every character by himself. He would recycle this concept a year later for Mito Kōmon tai Gojira.
title: Takeshita Performance 1: Secret Art of Mito Komon
